products.name: Andromeda Crystal Lamp
products.description: A soft-glow crystal lamp that adds instant galaxy vibes to any room.

products.name: Nebula Notebook
products.description: A smooth, space-themed notebook for notes, sketches, or midnight brain dumps.

products.name: Orion Mug
products.description: A sturdy mug for coffee, tea, or potion-making—constellation energy included.

products.name: Galaxy Throw Blanket
products.description: Cozy up in a blanket that looks like a night sky—soft, warm, and ridiculously comfy.

products.name: Star Map Poster
products.description: A clean star map print that makes your wall look like a planetarium.

products.name: Meteorite Paperweight
products.description: A heavy desk paperweight with meteor vibes—keeps papers down and mood up.

products.name: Cosmic Phone Case
products.description: A galaxy-style phone case that protects your device and looks cool doing it.

products.name: Planet Coaster Set
products.description: A set of planet-themed coasters to keep tables safe from drinks and chaos.

products.name: Moon Phase Wall Clock
products.description: A moon-phase inspired wall clock that turns ‘what time is it’ into a vibe.

products.name: Asteroid Keychain
products.description: A small keychain with big space energy—easy to spot, hard to lose.

products.name: Rocket Ship Lamp
products.description: A fun rocket-shaped lamp that adds warm light and launch-day vibes.

products.name: Astronaut Figurine
products.description: A small astronaut figure for shelves, desks, or anywhere you need a tiny explorer.

products.name: Stargazer Journal
products.description: A journal made for night thoughts, dream logs, and planning your next cosmic era.

products.name: Comet Pen Set
products.description: A smooth-writing pen set for school, work, or writing dramatic villain monologues.

products.name: Solar System Puzzle
products.description: A solar-system themed puzzle that’s fun, chill, and secretly educational.

products.name: Galaxy Water Bottle
products.description: A reusable water bottle with a galaxy design—hydration, but make it cosmic.

products.name: Lunar Night Light
products.description: A gentle moon-inspired night light that makes bedtime feel like a calm planet.

products.name: Satellite Desk Lamp
products.description: A desk lamp with clean, modern lines—bright enough for work, cool enough for display.

products.name: Constellation Hoodie
products.description: A warm hoodie with constellation vibes—soft on the inside, main character on the outside.

products.name: Space Sticker Pack
products.description: A sticker pack full of space icons—perfect for laptops, bottles, notebooks, and chaos.

products.name: Aurora Star Candle
products.description: A galaxy-inspired candle with a soft glow vibe—perfect for chill nights and main-character mood lighting.

reviews.name: Lena Morales
reviews.comment: The glow is perfect. Instant cozy galaxy corner.

reviews.name: Marcus Chen
reviews.comment: Paper quality feels good and it lays flat. Solid buy.

reviews.name: Ava Thompson
reviews.comment: Best mug ever. I would drink hot chocolate from it forever.

reviews.name: Noah Patel
reviews.comment: Super soft. It’s become the default couch blanket.

reviews.name: Sophie Bennett
reviews.comment: Looks clean on the wall and the print is crisp.

reviews.name: Ethan Walker
reviews.comment: Heavy enough to actually work as a paperweight. Cute too.

reviews.name: Mia Rodriguez
reviews.comment: Fits well and feels sturdy. Design is sick.

reviews.name: Oliver Grant
reviews.comment: They look adorable on the table and don’t slide around.

reviews.name: Charlotte Kim
reviews.comment: Moon phase vibe is elite. It’s a conversation starter.

reviews.name: Lucas Rivera
reviews.comment: Tiny but cute. My keys are easier to find now.

reviews.name: Henry Collins
reviews.comment: Rocket lamp = coolest thing in my room.

reviews.name: Emily Foster
reviews.comment: Looks great on a shelf. Little astronaut energy boost.

reviews.name: Daniel Brooks
reviews.comment: Nice journal. Good for notes and planning.

reviews.name: Grace Nguyen
reviews.comment: Writes smooth and doesn’t smudge. I’m obsessed.

reviews.name: Logan Price
reviews.comment: Fun puzzle and I learned planet names again.

reviews.name: Isabella Cruz
reviews.comment: Cute bottle and doesn’t leak in my bag.

reviews.name: Caleb Turner
reviews.comment: Perfect soft light for the hallway at night.

reviews.name: Harper Scott
reviews.comment: Bright and clean looking. Makes the desk feel official.

reviews.name: Jack Sullivan
reviews.comment: Comfy and warm. The star design is subtle but cool.

reviews.name: Ella Peterson
reviews.comment: Stickers!!! I put them on everything.

reviews.name: Priya Desai
reviews.comment: Smells amazing and the glow is so cozy. Instant vibe upgrade.

reviews.name: Jordan Miller
reviews.comment: Burns evenly and looks cute on the shelf. Would buy again.
